attributes.action: change the high rate of child benefit charge to be household based not individua
attributes.additional_details: because it’s a government policy which is outdated and unfair in this current world
attributes.background:
currently if parent 1 earns 55000 and parent 2 10000 child benefit is paid back. 
but if parent 1 earns 49999 and parent 2 49999 nothing is paid back. 
meaning lower income family’s are put further at risk. the calculation should be similar to child tax where it’s based on household earnings
